label: Reverend Jessie Williams and the Embry Choir

metadata.label: title
metadata.value: Reverend Jessie Williams and the Embry Choir

metadata.label: description
metadata.value: The Reverend Jessie Williams and the Embry Choir gathered for this photograph on April 27, 1948. Members of the choir are, from left to right, Mary Daisy Briscoe, Mattie Johnson, Evelyn Tyner, Agnes Gross, Willa Mae Smith, James Edwards Jr., Dora Robinson, Annabelle Stroud, Leon Robinson, Amy Potts, Ellen Briscoe, Emma Harrison, Maggie Mack, Ila Mason, and Hazel Thomas.

metadata.label: source
metadata.value: Lakeland Community Heritage Project, Inc., Lakeland: African Americans in College Park (Charleston, SC: Arcadia Pub., 2009), 38.
